divs: Sighting DetailsI was sleeping out on my land in Steens MS on the night of 1314 August 2004. About 400 a.m., I was sleeping outside I saw three or four bright objects to thewest that would appear, disappear, and then reappear in different locations, butin the same area of the sky. They made no sound. I watched for a few minutes,then, went inside the camper to sleep. I havent found anything on the internetthat would explain this, not even a good example on the UFO sites and was hopingyou might have an idea what it was. Ive also reported reported another object Isaw around 1000 PM.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Steens
There were 2 other sightings in Steens on or around August 14th 2004
